ygData.subject: Re: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Only ... at ... Also, I m 38 now, and I can tell you that taunt won t go up after level 30, dodge and parry don t go up after 35 (don t know the skill
ygData.messageBody:
> Nope. Both my bash and taunt are still going at lvl 24. Up to 125 now.
Only
> skill I know of that capped so far was Archery at 75. Oh, and bind wounds
at
> 100. All the rest keep going for at least a little longer.

Also, I'm 38 now, and I can tell you that taunt won't go up after level 30,
dodge and parry don't go up after 35 (don't know the skill number thing
though -- 150 and 175/175 respectively?). Offense, defense, 2HS, and double
attack are all still rising though, along with spell skills.

Dravith Vandre'i
Dark Elf SK (38)
Fennin Ro
